form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, 4-150

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE GPO: 1973-521-939 Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Form Approved O.M.B. No. 43-R0400 FEE STAMP File No. A21 485 800 SAU et PAID APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: $2500 No. Sec. 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act Sec. 245 IMMIGRATION PAI R>LIZATION SERVICE Sec: 214(d), I&N Act Sec. 249 I&N Act ATLANTA, GEORGIA Date 8-16-76 62 Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 Verified By ATLANT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLINGAIN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A, B, C, D, E, or F) A. As a refugee to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act). B. As a person who entered the U.S. with a visa issued to me as the fiancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days after my entry, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Sec. 214(d), I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13, Act of September 11, 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&N Act). F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1, 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section FATHER 249, I&N Act). 2. My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 3. Sex PINJANI CHETANRAM SHIVANDASS Male Female 4. I reside in the Unifed States/at: (eto) (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 5. Have you ever applied before for permanent resident 4024 CEDAR GATEROAD HUNTSVILLE Mahama 35810 status in the U.S.? Yes No 6. My alien registration number 7. I am a citizen of (Country) 8. Date of Birth (If "Yes", give the date and place of filing and is A21485 800 INDIA June 6, 1905 final disposition.) 9. Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) Dakhan - SUKKUR - SINDH- Pakistan 10. Name as appears on nonimmigrant document (Form I-94) I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) Chetanraw Shivanclass. Pujjuen on (Month) (Day) (Year) by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) New york, N.Y April 30 1976 PAN-Amerilan as a (visitor, student, crewman, parolee, etc.) my I-94 permit number is Visitor 4 4 60 I 76 was was not inspected. 11. My nonimmigrant visa, number 010101 was issued by the on (Month) (Day) (Year) 12. I am single married United States Consul at (City)(Country) New DelhiIN. April 23 76 divorced widowed 13. I have been married one times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) a. Number of times my husband or wife has been married b. Name of husband or wife (Wife give maiden name) one sugni Bai Hasrajmal Vaswani c. My husband or wife resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.)(No. & Street) Town or City) )(Province or State) (Country) 14. a. I have one sons or daughters as follows: (Complete all columns as to each son or daughter; if living with you state "with me" in last column; otherwise give city and state or country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now living at Moti Chetauram Riyum Male Sukkus November with me such Pakistan 15, 1939 b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: Mywife 15. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never been a member of any organization, state "None".) None UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D -TRANS.
